metadata.title: Saad Rafique calls on Shehbaz Sharif, lauds public-friendly budget

content.article_body: LAHORE, Jun 14 (APP):Former Federal Minister and senior PML-N leader Khawaja Saad Rafique called on Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Saturday. During the meeting, Khawaja Saad Rafique congratulated the Prime Minister on presenting a public-friendly federal budget, describing it as a positive step towards economic stability and much-needed relief for the people. The two leaders also held a detailed discussion on the current political situation in the country, reaffirming their commitment to addressing national challenges through unity and democratic dialogue.
